Statute.Title: Income Tax Amendments Revision Act
Statute.OtherLangTitle: (Impôt sur le revenu, Loi de révision des modifications relatives à)

CIF.Text: CIF, 1994, c. 7 deemed in force 01.03.94 see s. 6 see also the Income Tax Act, R.S., c. 1 (5th Supp.) and the Income Tax Application Rules, R.S., c. 2 (5th Supp.) for coming into force of Schedules
